title: 2Kraken Watch Face
summary: A battery friendly, fancy, minimalistic and modern Watch Face!
description: You ever wanted to have a battery friendly, fancy, minimalistic and modern Watch Face? Then the 2Kraken Watch Face is the correct one for you! This Watch Face just looks awesome everywhere and is a real eyecatcher!Benefits:★ Choose between all material design colors★ Addons like Show Date, Show Status icons★ Low Battery warning (Status icon)★ Different font types★ Energy Safe Mode★ For round and square Smartwatches★ And so much more!As you can see this Watch Face comes with an clear but pretty high customizable settings app! But the most important point is, this app didn't got build just to look awesome, it is also very battery friendly!Still something missing or not working? No problem. Just feel free to write us an email or join the community (Link below)Listed on Best Watch Faces: http://best-watchfaces.com/watchfaces/2krakenKvnX Dev Support:Create a ticket (English): http://community.kvnxdev.com/tickets/Support via E-Mail (English / German): support@kvnxdev.comSources:- Phlat Watch Template by Erik von Stackelberg - Color Picker by Google (Fork by woalk https://github.com/woalk/android-colorpicker)
descriptionHTML:
You ever wanted to have a battery friendly, fancy, minimalistic and modern Watch Face? Then the 2Kraken Watch Face is the correct one for you! This Watch Face just looks awesome everywhere and is a real eyecatcher!


Benefits:
★ Choose between all material design colors
★ Addons like Show Date, Show Status icons
★ Low Battery warning (Status icon)
★ Different font types
★ Energy Safe Mode
★ For round and square Smartwatches
★ And so much more!


As you can see this Watch Face comes with an clear but pretty high customizable settings app!
But the most important point is, this app didn't got build just to look awesome, it is also very battery friendly!


Still something missing or not working? No problem. Just feel free to write us an email or join the community (Link below)


Listed on Best Watch Faces: http://best-watchfaces.com/watchfaces/2kraken


KvnX Dev Support:
Create a ticket (English): http://community.kvnxdev.com/tickets/
Support via E-Mail (English / German): support@kvnxdev.com


Sources:
- Phlat Watch Template by Erik von Stackelberg
- Color Picker by Google (Fork by woalk https://github.com/woalk/android-colorpicker)
comments: Love this app, great funky design. The only down side-The battery symbol doesnt change to reflect battery usage.
It's great, can you fix the battery indicator and update for Wear 2.0?
Ambient mode should not grey out the text since this does not save energy compared to white text
recentChanges: - Fix: Displayed wrong month on some date formats
